disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Unseen Predator.

range.value: 725

target range.value: 50

blurb.value: While in brush, Rengar leaps at his target with his basic attack. Rengar's abilities build Ferocity. Upon reaching full Ferocity, his next ability becomes empowered and grants him Movement Speed on cast, but he instantly loses all Ferocity if he leaves combat. Killing enemy champions awards trophies on Rengar's Bonetooth Necklace, permanently increasing his Attack Damage.

description.value: Innate: Rengar generates 1 Ferocity whenever he casts a basic ability. Reaching 4 Ferocity makes his next basic ability empowered, granting an additional cast along with 30 / 40 / 50% (based on level)  bonus movement speed for 1.5 seconds at the cost of all Ferocity. Reaching 4 Ferocity with Savagery or Bola Strike locks its empowered version from use for 0.1 seconds before and after casting it. All Ferocity is lost after being out of combat for 8 seconds.

description2.value: While in brush, Rengar's basic attacks have massively increased range and cause him to leap to his target's location, attacking the target upon arrival and landing closer than his normal melee range. This effect lingers for 0.25 seconds upon exiting brush but is lost immediately if Rengar casts Flash or Hexflash to do so. Leaping with 0 Ferocity generates 1 Ferocity.

description3.value: Innate - Bonetooth Necklace: Takedowns within 1.5 seconds of being damaged by Rengar grant him a Trophy per unique enemy champion, up to 5. An additional one is made available through the event The Hunt is On!. Trophies grant 1% − 36% (based on trophies) bonus AD as  bonus attack damage.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * Unseen Predator occurs regardless of whether or not Rengar's target has sight of him. Rengar will not leap to targets already in his basic attack range. While grounded or rooted, Rengar loses the enhanced  attack range from Unseen Predator. Rengar will only leap to a target if his basic attack timer has been refreshed (if not so he will not automatically attempt to path towards his target, despite them being within leap range). Only Flash and Hexflash instantly end Unseen Predator. Other effects (i.e Teleport) will still keep the buff for the specified amount of time upon leaving brush. Rengar can freely use any abilities, summoner spells, or item actives while leaping. Using a dash or blink ability will interrupt the leap. The leap's attack will have no effect if the target dies or becomes untargetable. Savagery's empowered attack will always be consumed. The attack from the leap will: Not go off if the dash was interrupted. Go off at the end of the dash even if its normal destination is obstructed by boundaries he cannot cross (e.g. terrain, The Hextech Ultimatum). Go off regardless of distance the enemy travels away from Rengar's original location. Go off even if Rengar loses sight of the target. Rapid Firecannon's and Savagery's bonus ranges are lost after 0.25 seconds upon gaining Unseen Predator, and are re-gained after 0.25 seconds upon losing Unseen Predator. Bonetooth Necklace uses different icons corresponding to the number of stacks acquired: 1 Stack: 2 Stacks: 3 Stacks: 4 Stacks: 5 Stacks: 6th Stack: Head of Kha'Zix
notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Savagery.

description.value: Active: Rengar's next two basic attacks within 3 seconds gain  40% bonus attack speed, with the first also becoming unstoppable, gaining  25 bonus range and dealing bonus physical damage.

description2.value: Empowered Active: Savagery's bonus physical damage is modified and grants Rengar 50% − 101% (based on level)  bonus attack speed for 5 seconds.

leveling2.value: Empowered Bonus Physical Damage:30 − 240 (based on level) (+ 40% AD)

description3.value: Savagery resets Rengar's basic attack timer.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * The enhanced attack applies other on-hit effects as well as  life steal and can critically strike as normal (the bonus damage cannot) but does not deal bonus damage to structures (the attack will still be consumed however).
notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Battle Roar.

effect radius.value: 450

blurb.value: Rengar lets out a battle roar, damaging enemies and healing for some of the recent damage he has taken. Ferocity effect: additionally breaks crowd control effects.

description.value: Active: Rengar lets out a battle roar, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies and healing himself for 50% of the damage he's taken in the last 1.5 seconds. This is increased to 75% of damage taken versus monsters.

description2.value: Empowered Active: Battle Roar's magic damage is modified and additionally cleanses Rengar of all crowd control.

leveling2.value: Empowered Magic Damage:50 − 220 (based on level) (+ 80% AP)

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Bola Strike.

target range.value: 1000

width.value: 140

blurb.value: Rengar throws a bola, slowing the first target hit for a short duration. Ferocity effect: roots the target.

description.value: Active: Rengar throws a bola in the target direction, dealing physical damage to the first enemy hit and slowing them for 1.75 seconds.

description2.value: Empowered Active: Bola Strike's physical damage is modified and roots its target for 1.75 seconds.

leveling2.value: Empowered Physical Damage:50 − 305 (based on level) (+ 80% bonus AD)

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * If Rengar casts Savagery and/or Battle Roar during Bola Strike's cast time, he will buffer them and cast them when Bola Strike completes. Bola Strike will cast from wherever Rengar is at the end of the cast time.
notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Thrill of the Hunt.

effect radius.value: 2500 / 3000 / 3500

custominfo.value: 710

blurb.value: Rengar's predatory instincts take over, Camouflaging him and revealing the nearest enemy champion in a large radius around him. During Thrill of the Hunt, Rengar gains Movement Speed and he can leap to the tracked enemy for a guaranteed critical strike, even without being in brush.

description.value: Active: Rengar activates his predatory instincts, revealing the nearest enemy champion and gaining  bonus movement speed for a duration.

description2.value: After 2 seconds, he also becomes camouflaged and gains Unseen Predator for the remaining duration. His next basic attack within normal attack range against any enemy unit or with Unseen Predator against the nearest enemy champion deals 50% AD bonus physical damage and  reduces the target's armor for 4 seconds.

description3.value: The nearest enemy champion to Rengar alerts all of their allies within 1200 range about his presence, and they can sense him at 1600 range.

description4.value: Attacking or casting abilities, though not Savagery, ends Thrill of the Hunt immediately.

description5.value: Enemy champions spotted by Thrill of the Hunt stay revealed within Rengar's reveal range while the stealth persists.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * Thrill of the Hunt's duration starts on-cast. The armor reduction applies after the attack. The true sight reveal on the target stays until the leap finishes. Rengar discerns a distinct heart beat from revealed champions during Thrill of the Hunt. The nearest detected enemy champion is also indicated as the victim, having two eyes above them. This indicator is visible to both teams and may switch targets. Alerted allies will hear a   threatening growl following an eerie sound effect.
notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.
